entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding test for ToolPackageDownloader in sdk #34847
  • Add a EventPipe test for a native AOT library #34839
    .NET 8.0
  • [API Compat] Add extension method validation #34824
  • Add Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.Metrics to the list of default usings for ASP.NET Core applications #34813
  • [Repo] Add automatic style/formatting mechanism #34810

Closed

  • Non-descriptive error on .NET Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers deploy DN8.P6 #34329

PullRequests

Created

  • Update dependabot.yml to target 8.0.1xx #34848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Remove hot reload deltas cache #34845
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Make UseRidGraph property map to runtime config option #34836
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34819
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix typo in StaticWebAsset.cs #34818
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable interceptors feature when ConfigurationBindingGenerator is enabled #34840
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, .NET 8.0
  • [main] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture comparison to match product #34843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture comparison to match product #34838
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Correct command model for nuget trust command and subcommands #34649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] add note about supporting identity token auth for containers in .NET 8 #34718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34734
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Ran 'dotnet format' on sdk.sln #34659
    untriaged

Updated

  • Implement automated cleanup of stage 0 #34693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.0 in /eng/dependabot #34788
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.4xx
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Make illink error less specific #34806
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
